scripts.create-database: sudo -u postgres psql postgres -h localhost -d mrcoffee_app -f sql/create_database.sql
scripts.create-tables: sudo -u postgres psql postgres -h localhost -d mrcoffee_app -f sql/create_schedule_table.sql
scripts.seed-tables: sudo -u postgres psql postgres -h localhost -d mrcoffee_app -f sql/seed_schedule_table.sql
